messages: ... Instead God is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance. (2 Peter 3:9)

match.Jesus: He (Jesus) was in anguish and prayed even more earnestly. His sweat became like drops of blood falling on the ground (Luke 22:44)

message: Jesus suffer for your anxiety and his blood cleanse you so that you can have rest
